Imagery Description: (a) Draped woman, holding mirror and wreath, seated to left on rockNon Sepcifiedpile, looking back to right, (b) draped woman with mirror and bunch of grapes, moving to left.
Additional Notes: Found with a lekanis (5459) representing a female head (no. 2/872 above) in a style approaching that of the Painter ofNaples 2585.
